pr_title: DHFPROD-4173: Apply additional settings in flow runner

timeline.message: DHFPROD-4173: Apply additional settings in flow runner

timeline.bodyText: Shouldn't there be a unit test against getArtifactSettings for a mapping to verify that the defaults are returned if there aren't settings yet?
timeline.author: rjrudin
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -91,5 +102,6 @@ module.exports = {
     getPermissions,
     getArtifactNode,
     validateArtifact,
-    getArtifactSettingNode
+    getArtifactSettingNode,
+    defaultArtifactSettings

replies.bodyText: Added to the ML unit test to test the retrieval of default settings.
replies.author: ryanjdew

timeline.bodyText: I think verifyThatLoadDataSettingsAreAppliedToStepConfig in FlowRunnerTest should be expanded to cover these fixes.
timeline.author: rjrudin

timeline.message: DHFPROD-4173: Apply additional settings in flow runner

timeline.bodyText: @ryanjdew wondering if this should be default-mapping or entity-services-mapping?
timeline.author: bsrikan

replies.bodyText: default-mapping is the collection set by entity-services-mapping step definition.
replies.author: ryanjdew
